Amateur Night

Ano: 2016

IMDb ID: tt4265508

Classificação: 5.1

Sinopse: Guy Carter, an award-winning graduate student of architecture, has a beautiful wife and a baby on the way. The problem? He doesn't have "his ducks in a row," which only fuels his doubts about being a good father. He has been trying to find work in his field for a year with no luck. At wit's end, his wife Anne finds him a job as a "driver" on Craigslist. Guy shows up for the interview thinking he'll be delivering pizzas, but quickly realizes that he'd be driving prostitutes around. Money's too scarce to turn down the job, so he goes for it, and there he meets tough-as-nails, unapologetic sex worker Nikki and her two hilarious, foul-mouthed cohorts Jaxi and Fallon. As reluctant driver and protector Guy is thrust into a world of rockin' women and feeble men. During one wild and sordid night that includes several "come-to-Jesus" moments, Guy proves to Nikki, and himself, that he has what it takes to be the responsible father his family deserves.—Cinedigm
